## Setup

After installing the RNetLogo package, load the library and define the file path where NetLogo is installed on your computer.

On Windows, the following path is standard.

```{r, message=FALSE, results = "hide", title = "{{ site.handouts }}"}
library(RNetLogo)

nl_jar <- "C:/Program Files/NetLogo 6.0.1/app/netlogo-6.0.1.jar"
nl_path <- dirname(nl_jar)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
if (Sys.info()['sysname'] == 'Darwin') {
    nl_path <- "/Applications/NetLogo 6.0.1/Java/netlogo-6.0.1.jar"
    nl_path <- dirname(nl_jar)
}
```
